solution_line_template: If the car traveled from Ningi to Zipra in {percentage_ningi_to_zipra} of the time it traveled from Ngapara to Zipra, it took {percentage_ningi_to_zipra}*{time_ngapara_to_zipra} = <<{percentage_ningi_to_zipra}*{time_ngapara_to_zipra}={time_ningi_to_zipra}>>{time_ningi_to_zipra} hours to travel from Ningi to Zipra.
The total travel time that day is {time_ningi_to_zipra}+{time_ngapara_to_zipra} = <<{time_ningi_to_zipra}+{time_ngapara_to_zipra}={total_travel_time}>>{total_travel_time} hours
